Nergi's Dive Bomb is nothing as long as you either have earplugs or a weapon that can block (Greatsword ftw there).

Frustrating is having end game defense and a full 150 hp and being full combo'd to death 1-3 damage at a time from a low garuga because he times each attack to hit as your frames end but you don't have control yet.....

That and brachadios is my bane with that delayed hay-maker (I swear he waits until I try to get up, no matter how long I wait for).

I find nergigante to be a minor annoyance after things like:
1) Hellblade glavenus zansetoken covering entire zones
2) khezu flying between zones without landing for literally 30 minutes
3) brute grix derpy charge (into omgwtf roar)
4) chameleos original that stayed invis unless you broke his horn, which required Dragon damage that he himself was NOT weak to and he had both poison and virulent poison and could steal items from stealth
5) green nargacuga prowl mode that held it until someone moved and then went lunge mode through your blind spot (behind usually)
6) both narga species going hyper leap spam mode when blinded......
7) ukanalos and akantor being so stupid big and slow in charges that blocking took 2-3 hits and safety leaps still got hit
8) red fatalis 2 o'clock meteor.....
{{sticker:sg-ahri-1}}
I don't like the Gog laser beam, especially the one where it flies up and proceeds to have a seizure while shooting the damn thing.

Usually left zone for the flying beam, too unpredictable.  If you stayed in the zone, safest place was under it.
Plessi's hitbox has been steadily shrinking each installment..... Which is terrifying if you think about it.... Early plessioth hit the entire zone with that hip check
Imagine... if plesioth was in the first monster hunter game
